summary: Makes Unarmed viable without scripts or "unarmed weapons". Add some perks while maintaining the "Vanilla feeling".
descriptionHtml:
Unarmed is a cool concept in RPGs but in Skyrim it's mechanic is very weak. With this mod I added some perks that will increase unarmed effectiveness without adding scripts, "Unarmed Weapons" or simply too much like other mods. 

There are 2 versions, "heavy armor" and "alteration". They have the same perks, some with diferent names. [u]Go to Download Section and choose one.[/u]

Description:

[color=#00ff00][b][size=5]Heavy Armor Version[/size][/b][/color]

[color=#ffff00]Fist of Steel (30pts): [/color]unchanged

[color=#ffff00]Heavy Punches (40pts):[/color] New perk - increase unarmed damage based on character's heavy armor skill. (every 5 pts, +2 unarmed damage)

[color=#ffff00]Brawler (50pts):[/color] New Perk - Decrease incoming damage by 20% when completely unarmed + unarmed power attacks stagger lightly

[color=#ffff00]Focus (60pts):[/color] New perk - When completely unarmed, time slows down when enemies power attack.

[color=#ffff00]Bear's Paw (70pts):[/color] New perk - When completely unarmed, power attacks are more effective against targets that are blocking. (+50 damage + heavy stagger)

[color=#ffff00]Dragon Strike (80pts):[/color] New perk - When completly unarmed, power attacks are 50% stronger and have a chance to knock back enemies

[color=#00ffff][size=5][b]Alteration Version [/b][/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff]Fist of Steel: Changed perk to Momentum in Heavy Armor skill tree. It will add +25% stagger to attacks when using full heavy armor.[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Hardened Fists (30pts):[/color][color=#ffff00] [/color]New perk - Flesh Spells add unarmed damage. (oak=10, stone=12, iron=14, ebony=16, dragon=18)

[color=#ff7700]Spiritual Strength (40pts):[/color] New perk - increase unarmed damage based on character's alteration skill. (every 5 pts, +2 unarmed damage)

[color=#ff7700]Monk (50pts):[/color] New Perk - Decrease incoming damage by 20% when completely unarmed + unarmed power attacks stagger lightly

[color=#ff7700]Focus (60pts):[/color] New perk - When completely unarmed, time slows down when enemies power attack.
[color=#ff7700]
Bear's Paw (70pts): [/color]New perk - When completely unarmed, power attacks are more effective against targets that are blocking. (+50 damage + heavy stagger)

[color=#ff7700]Dragon Strike (80pts):[/color] New perk - When completly unarmed, power attacks are 50% stronger and have a chance to knock back enemies


[color=#f1c232]Since you can't block with unarmed, "Brawler/Monk" and "Focus" should compensate that giving you more defense and a chance to dodge power attacks.[/color]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have also added a small fix to "Insightful Enchanter". This perk was not improving unarmed enchantment by 25%. You will find this fix in the download Section.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download this if you haven't already:[b] [/b][b]Modern Brawl Bug Fix[/b] -[color=#00ffff] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77465[/color]
It is not a requirement, just a very known bug fix for brawl fights.



If you want more strong things nerfed and weak things buffed, please check this:
